title: Little Women
author: Louisa May Alcott
description: Follow along with four sisters as they find their adventures in everyday life.

title: Count of Monte Cristo
author: Alexandre Dumas
description: A thrilling adventure full of mystery and intrigue, with a little romance thrown in.

title: The Adventures of Tom Swayer
author: Mark Twain
description: A story of growing, sure to entertain everyone.

title: The Time Machine
author: H.G Wells
description: Time travel, future societies, and adventure all rolled into one great read!

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea
author: Jules Verne
description: Experience the underwater world as never before in this thrilling adventure.
